alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi al-mubīni
innā anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka aḥsana al-qaṣaṣi bimā awḥaynā ilayka hādhā al-qur'āna wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina al-ghāfilīna
idh qāla yūsufu li-abīhi yāabati innī ra-aytu aḥada ʿashara kawkaban wal-shamsa wal-qamara ra-aytuhum lī sājidīna
qāla yābunayya lā taqṣuṣ ru'yāka ʿalā ikh'watika fayakīdū laka kaydan inna al-shayṭāna lil'insāni ʿaduwwun mubīnun

wakadhālika yajtabīka rabbuka wayuʿallimuka min tawīli al-aḥādīthi wayutimmu niʿ'matahu ʿalayka waʿalā āli yaʿqūba kamā atammahā ʿalā abawayka min qablu ib'rāhīma wa-is'ḥāqa inna rabbaka ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
idh qālū layūsufu wa-akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun inna abānā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
uq'tulū yūsufa awi iṭ'raḥūhu arḍan yakhlu lakum wajhu abīkum watakūnū min baʿdihi qawman ṣāliḥīna
qāla qāilun min'hum lā taqtulū yūsufa wa-alqūhu fī ghayābati al-jubi yaltaqiṭ'hu baʿḍu al-sayārati in kuntum fāʿilīna
qālū yāabānā mā laka lā tamannā ʿalā yūsufa wa-innā lahu lanāṣiḥūna
arsil'hu maʿanā ghadan yartaʿ wayalʿab wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
qāla innī layaḥzununī an tadhhabū bihi wa-akhāfu an yakulahu al-dhi'bu wa-antum ʿanhu ghāfilūna
qālū la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun innā idhan lakhāsirūna
falammā dhahabū bihi wa-ajmaʿū an yajʿalūhu fī ghayābati al-jubi wa-awḥaynā ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hādhā wahum lā yashʿurūna
wajāū abāhum ʿishāan yabkūna
qālū yāabānā innā dhahabnā nastabiqu wataraknā yūsufa ʿinda matāʿinā fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wamā anta bimu'minin lanā walaw kunnā ṣādiqīna
wajāū ʿalā qamīṣihi bidamin kadhibin qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran faṣabrun jamīlun wal-lahu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
wajāat sayyāratun fa-arsalū wāridahum fa-adlā dalwahu qāla yābush'rā hādhā ghulāmun wa-asarrūhu biḍāʿatan wal-lahu ʿalīmun bimā yaʿmalūna
washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna

waqāla alladhī ish'tarāhu min miṣ'ra li-im'ra-atihi akrimī mathwāhu ʿasā an yanfaʿanā aw nattakhidhahu waladan wakadhālika makkannā liyūsufa fī al-arḍi walinuʿallimahu min tawīli al-aḥādīthi wal-lahu ghālibun ʿalā amrihi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
walammā balagha ashuddahu ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
warāwadathu allatī huwa fī baytihā ʿan nafsihi waghallaqati al-abwāba waqālat hayta laka qāla maʿādha al-lahi innahu rabbī aḥsana mathwāya innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
walaqad hammat bihi wahamma bihā lawlā an raā bur'hāna rabbihi kadhālika linaṣrifa ʿanhu al-sūa wal-faḥshāa innahu min ʿibādinā al-mukh'laṣīna
wa-is'tabaqā al-bāba waqaddat qamīṣahu min duburin wa-alfayā sayyidahā ladā al-bābi qālat mā jazāu man arāda bi-ahlika sūan illā an yus'jana aw ʿadhābun alīmun
qāla hiya rāwadatnī ʿan nafsī washahida shāhidun min ahlihā in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min qubulin faṣadaqat wahuwa mina al-kādhibīna
wa-in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina al-ṣādiqīna
falammā raā qamīṣahu qudda min duburin qāla innahu min kaydikunna inna kaydakunna ʿaẓīmun
yūsufu aʿriḍ ʿan hādhā wa-is'taghfirī lidhanbiki innaki kunti mina al-khāṭiīna
waqāla nis'watun fī al-madīnati im'ra-atu al-ʿazīzi turāwidu fatāhā ʿan nafsihi qad shaghafahā ḥubban innā lanarāhā fī ḍalālin mubīnin

falammā samiʿat bimakrihinna arsalat ilayhinna wa-aʿtadat lahunna muttaka-an waātat kulla wāḥidatin min'hunna sikkīnan waqālati ukh'ruj ʿalayhinna falammā ra-aynahu akbarnahu waqaṭṭaʿna aydiyahunna waqul'na ḥāsha lillahi mā hādhā basharan in hādhā illā malakun karīmun
qālat fadhālikunna alladhī lum'tunnanī fīhi walaqad rāwadttuhu ʿan nafsihi fa-is'taʿṣama wala-in lam yafʿal mā āmuruhu layus'jananna walayakūnan mina al-ṣāghirīna
qāla rabbi al-sij'nu aḥabbu ilayya mimmā yadʿūnanī ilayhi wa-illā taṣrif ʿannī kaydahunna aṣbu ilayhinna wa-akun mina al-jāhilīna
fa-is'tajāba lahu rabbuhu faṣarafa ʿanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin

wadakhala maʿahu al-sij'na fatayāni qāla aḥaduhumā innī arānī aʿṣiru khamran waqāla al-ākharu innī arānī aḥmilu fawqa rasī khub'zan takulu al-ṭayru min'hu nabbi'nā bitawīlihi innā narāka mina al-muḥ'sinīna
qāla lā yatīkumā ṭaʿāmun tur'zaqānihi illā nabbatukumā bitawīlihi qabla an yatiyakumā dhālikumā mimmā ʿallamanī rabbī innī taraktu millata qawmin lā yu'minūna bil-lahi wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
wa-ittabaʿtu millata ābāī ib'rāhīma wa-is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba mā kāna lanā an nush'rika bil-lahi min shayin dhālika min faḍli al-lahi ʿalaynā waʿalā al-nāsi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yashkurūna
yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru

mā taʿbudūna min dūnihi illā asmāan sammaytumūhā antum waābāukum mā anzala al-lahu bihā min sul'ṭānin ini al-ḥuk'mu illā lillahi amara allā taʿbudū illā iyyāhu dhālika al-dīnu al-qayimu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni ammā aḥadukumā fayasqī rabbahu khamran wa-ammā al-ākharu fayuṣ'labu fatakulu al-ṭayru min rasihi quḍiya al-amru alladhī fīhi tastaftiyāni
waqāla lilladhī ẓanna annahu nājin min'humā udh'kur'nī ʿinda rabbika fa-ansāhu al-shayṭānu dhik'ra rabbihi falabitha fī al-sij'ni biḍ'ʿa sinīna
waqāla al-maliku innī arā sabʿa baqarātin simānin yakuluhunna sabʿun ʿijāfun wasabʿa sunbulātin khuḍ'rin wa-ukhara yābisātin yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī ru'yāya in kuntum lilrru'yā taʿburūna
qālū aḍghāthu aḥlāmin wamā naḥnu bitawīli al-aḥlāmi biʿālimīna
waqāla alladhī najā min'humā wa-iddakara baʿda ummatin anā unabbi-ukum bitawīlihi fa-arsilūni
yūsufu ayyuhā al-ṣidīqu aftinā fī sabʿi baqarātin simānin yakuluhunna sabʿun ʿijāfun wasabʿi sunbulātin khuḍ'rin wa-ukhara yābisātin laʿallī arjiʿu ilā al-nāsi laʿallahum yaʿlamūna
qāla tazraʿūna sabʿa sinīna da-aban famā ḥaṣadttum fadharūhu fī sunbulihi illā qalīlan mimmā takulūna
thumma yatī min baʿdi dhālika sabʿun shidādun yakul'na mā qaddamtum lahunna illā qalīlan mimmā tuḥ'ṣinūna
thumma yatī min baʿdi dhālika ʿāmun fīhi yughāthu al-nāsu wafīhi yaʿṣirūna
waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi falammā jāahu al-rasūlu qāla ir'jiʿ ilā rabbika fasalhu mā bālu al-nis'wati allātī qaṭṭaʿna aydiyahunna inna rabbī bikaydihinna ʿalīmun

qāla mā khaṭbukunna idh rāwadttunna yūsufa ʿan nafsihi qul'na ḥāsha lillahi mā ʿalim'nā ʿalayhi min sūin qālati im'ra-atu al-ʿazīzi al-āna ḥaṣḥaṣa al-ḥaqu anā rāwadttuhu ʿan nafsihi wa-innahu lamina al-ṣādiqīna
dhālika liyaʿlama annī lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī kayda al-khāinīna
wamā ubarri-u nafsī inna al-nafsa la-ammāratun bil-sūi illā mā raḥima rabbī inna rabbī ghafūrun raḥīmun
waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi astakhliṣ'hu linafsī falammā kallamahu qāla innaka al-yawma ladaynā makīnun amīnun
qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
wakadhālika makkannā liyūsufa fī al-arḍi yatabawwa-u min'hā ḥaythu yashāu nuṣību biraḥmatinā man nashāu walā nuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
wala-ajru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
wajāa ikh'watu yūsufa fadakhalū ʿalayhi faʿarafahum wahum lahu munkirūna
walammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim qāla i'tūnī bi-akhin lakum min abīkum alā tarawna annī ūfī al-kayla wa-anā khayru al-munzilīna
fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
waqāla lifit'yānihi ij'ʿalū biḍāʿatahum fī riḥālihim laʿallahum yaʿrifūnahā idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihim laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
falammā rajaʿū ilā abīhim qālū yāabānā muniʿa minnā al-kaylu fa-arsil maʿanā akhānā naktal wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
qāla hal āmanukum ʿalayhi illā kamā amintukum ʿalā akhīhi min qablu fal-lahu khayrun ḥāfiẓan wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
walammā fataḥū matāʿahum wajadū biḍāʿatahum ruddat ilayhim qālū yāabānā mā nabghī hādhihi biḍāʿatunā ruddat ilaynā wanamīru ahlanā wanaḥfaẓu akhānā wanazdādu kayla baʿīrin dhālika kaylun yasīrun
qāla lan ur'silahu maʿakum ḥattā tu'tūni mawthiqan mina al-lahi latatunnanī bihi illā an yuḥāṭa bikum falammā ātawhu mawthiqahum qāla al-lahu ʿalā mā naqūlu wakīlun

waqāla yābaniyya lā tadkhulū min bābin wāḥidin wa-ud'khulū min abwābin mutafarriqatin wamā ugh'nī ʿankum mina al-lahi min shayin ini al-ḥuk'mu illā lillahi ʿalayhi tawakkaltu waʿalayhi falyatawakkali al-mutawakilūna

walammā dakhalū min ḥaythu amarahum abūhum mā kāna yugh'nī ʿanhum mina al-lahi min shayin illā ḥājatan fī nafsi yaʿqūba qaḍāhā wa-innahu ladhū ʿil'min limā ʿallamnāhu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
walammā dakhalū ʿalā yūsufa āwā ilayhi akhāhu qāla innī anā akhūka falā tabta-is bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
falammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim jaʿala al-siqāyata fī raḥli akhīhi thumma adhana mu-adhinun ayyatuhā al-ʿīru innakum lasāriqūna
qālū wa-aqbalū ʿalayhim mādhā tafqidūna
qālū nafqidu ṣuwāʿa al-maliki waliman jāa bihi ḥim'lu baʿīrin wa-anā bihi zaʿīmun
qālū tal-lahi laqad ʿalim'tum mā ji'nā linuf'sida fī al-arḍi wamā kunnā sāriqīna
qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
qālū jazāuhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazāuhu kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna

fabada-a bi-awʿiyatihim qabla wiʿāi akhīhi thumma is'takhrajahā min wiʿāi akhīhi kadhālika kid'nā liyūsufa mā kāna liyakhudha akhāhu fī dīni al-maliki illā an yashāa al-lahu narfaʿu darajātin man nashāu wafawqa kulli dhī ʿil'min ʿalīmun
qālū in yasriq faqad saraqa akhun lahu min qablu fa-asarrahā yūsufu fī nafsihi walam yub'dihā lahum qāla antum sharrun makānan wal-lahu aʿlamu bimā taṣifūna
qālū yāayyuhā al-ʿazīzu inna lahu aban shaykhan kabīran fakhudh aḥadanā makānahu innā narāka mina al-muḥ'sinīna
qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna

falammā is'tayasū min'hu khalaṣū najiyyan qāla kabīruhum alam taʿlamū anna abākum qad akhadha ʿalaykum mawthiqan mina al-lahi wamin qablu mā farraṭtum fī yūsufa falan abraḥa al-arḍa ḥattā yadhana lī abī aw yaḥkuma al-lahu lī wahuwa khayru al-ḥākimīna
ir'jiʿū ilā abīkum faqūlū yāabānā inna ib'naka saraqa wamā shahid'nā illā bimā ʿalim'nā wamā kunnā lil'ghaybi ḥāfiẓīna
wasali al-qaryata allatī kunnā fīhā wal-ʿīra allatī aqbalnā fīhā wa-innā laṣādiqūna
qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran faṣabrun jamīlun ʿasā al-lahu an yatiyanī bihim jamīʿan innahu huwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
watawallā ʿanhum waqāla yāasafā ʿalā yūsufa wa-ib'yaḍḍat ʿaynāhu mina al-ḥuz'ni fahuwa kaẓīmun
qālū tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan aw takūna mina al-hālikīna
qāla innamā ashkū bathī waḥuz'nī ilā al-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
yābaniyya idh'habū fataḥassasū min yūsufa wa-akhīhi walā tāy'asū min rawḥi al-lahi innahu lā yāy'asu min rawḥi al-lahi illā al-qawmu al-kāfirūna
falammā dakhalū ʿalayhi qālū yāayyuhā al-ʿazīzu massanā wa-ahlanā al-ḍuru waji'nā bibiḍāʿatin muz'jātin fa-awfi lanā al-kayla wataṣaddaq ʿalaynā inna al-laha yajzī al-mutaṣadiqīna
qāla hal ʿalim'tum mā faʿaltum biyūsufa wa-akhīhi idh antum jāhilūna
qālū a-innaka la-anta yūsufu qāla anā yūsufu wahādhā akhī qad manna al-lahu ʿalaynā innahu man yattaqi wayaṣbir fa-inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
qālū tal-lahi laqad ātharaka al-lahu ʿalaynā wa-in kunnā lakhāṭiīna
qāla lā tathrība ʿalaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
idh'habū biqamīṣī hādhā fa-alqūhu ʿalā wajhi abī yati baṣīran watūnī bi-ahlikum ajmaʿīna
walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
falammā an jāa al-bashīru alqāhu ʿalā wajhihi fa-ir'tadda baṣīran qāla alam aqul lakum innī aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
qālū yāabānā is'taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭiīna
qāla sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbī innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
falammā dakhalū ʿalā yūsufa āwā ilayhi abawayhi waqāla ud'khulū miṣ'ra in shāa al-lahu āminīna

warafaʿa abawayhi ʿalā al-ʿarshi wakharrū lahu sujjadan waqāla yāabati hādhā tawīlu ru'yāya min qablu qad jaʿalahā rabbī ḥaqqan waqad aḥsana bī idh akhrajanī mina al-sij'ni wajāa bikum mina al-badwi min baʿdi an nazagha al-shayṭānu baynī wabayna ikh'watī inna rabbī laṭīfun limā yashāu innahu huwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
rabbi qad ātaytanī mina al-mul'ki waʿallamtanī min tawīli al-aḥādīthi fāṭira al-samāwāti wal-arḍi anta waliyyī fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati tawaffanī mus'liman wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh ajmaʿū amrahum wahum yamkurūna
wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
wamā tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illā dhik'run lil'ʿālamīna
waka-ayyin min āyatin fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yamurrūna ʿalayhā wahum ʿanhā muʿ'riḍūna
wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
afa-aminū an tatiyahum ghāshiyatun min ʿadhābi al-lahi aw tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
qul hādhihi sabīlī adʿū ilā al-lahi ʿalā baṣīratin anā wamani ittabaʿanī wasub'ḥāna al-lahi wamā anā mina al-mush'rikīna

wamā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim min ahli al-qurā afalam yasīrū fī al-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu alladhīna min qablihim waladāru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna ittaqaw afalā taʿqilūna
ḥattā idhā is'tayasa al-rusulu waẓannū annahum qad kudhibū jāahum naṣrunā fanujjiya man nashāu walā yuraddu basunā ʿani al-qawmi al-muj'rimīna
laqad kāna fī qaṣaṣihim ʿib'ratun li-ulī al-albābi mā kāna ḥadīthan yuf'tarā walākin taṣdīqa alladhī bayna yadayhi watafṣīla kulli shayin wahudan waraḥmatan liqawmin yu'minūna
